title: How to Make a Zucchini Scrambled Egg Burrito

steps.headline: Heat a small skillet on a medium heat.
Crack one egg into a small mixing bowl, and beat with a fork until the yolk is mixed with the white.
Grate in a couple of tablespoons of cheddar cheese.
If you have some leftover refried beans that aren't quite enough to make a normal burrito, add them too.
Dice about an inch and a half (about 4cm) of a zucchini into small cubes.
Add asafetida or garlic powder and pepper to taste.
Add three tablespoons of butter, margarine, or oil to the skillet.
steps.description: Spread the butter around the skillet until the skillet is evenly covered.

steps.headline: Dump the egg mixture into the skillet and scramble it.
When done, immediately dump the egg mixture onto a flour tortilla.

text: Heat a small skillet on a medium heat.  Crack one egg into a small mixing bowl, and beat with a fork until the yolk is mixed with the white.  Grate in a couple of tablespoons of cheddar cheese.  If you have some leftover refried beans that aren't quite enough to make a normal burrito, add them too.  Dice about an inch and a half (about 4cm) of a zucchini into small cubes. Add to the bowl. Add asafetida or garlic powder and pepper to taste. Mix with the fork. Add three tablespoons of butter, margarine, or oil to the skillet. Spread the butter around the skillet until the skillet is evenly covered. Dump the egg mixture into the skillet and scramble it.  When done, immediately dump the egg mixture onto a flour tortilla.  Serve with a cold beverage.
